{"id":839088307,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1667873669,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/839088307/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"42.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String makeGood(String s) {\n        Stack<Character> st= new Stack<>();\n        st.push(s.charAt(0));\n        for(int i=1;i<s.length();i++){\n            if(st.size()==0){\n                st.push(s.charAt(i));\n            }\n            else if(Math.abs(st.peek()-s.charAt(i))==32){\n                st.pop();\n            }\n            else{\n                 st.push(s.charAt(i));\n                \n            }\n            \n        }\n        StringBuilder sb= new StringBuilder();\n        while(st.size()!=0){\n            sb.append(st.pop());\n        }\n        return sb.reverse().toString();\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great","has_notes":false}
